defaultClubs.name: Association for Computing Machinery at Manoa
defaultClubs.description: The Association for Computing Machinery at Manoa is UH Manoa’s student chapter of the Association for Computing Machinery. We are a Registered Independent Organization (RIO) focused on providing opportunities and resources for our members’ personal and professional advancement.

defaultClubs.name: Grey Hats
defaultClubs.description: The ICS Grey Hats is a student-led, extracurricular organization focused on real-world training for cyber defense. Membership gives students an outstanding opportunity to learn and apply critical skills, and to share with others interested in modern security issues.

defaultClubs.name: Academy for Creative Media Student Association
defaultClubs.description: The Academy for Creative Media Student Association (ACMSA) is a Registered Independent Organization (RIO) at the University of Hawaii Manoa (UHM). The ACMSA is the student association for the Academy for Creative Media (ACM) which is an undergraduate bachelor's program at UHM.  ACM falls under the College of Arts & Humanities.
